name: Maize Farming Guide
info: Maize thrives in Agro-Ecological Zones LH 1-3, UM 1-4, LM 1-4 with proper fertilization.

name: Drought-resistant Sorghum
info: Ideal for semi-arid zones like UM 4-5, LM 4-5. Timely planting is key to success.

name: Soil Testing Kit
info: Essential for determining soil fertility variations before fertilizer application.
